hero_title: I build fast, accessible web products with attention to detail
hero_desc: Full-stack developer specialized in high-performance front-end, design systems and DX. Available for select projects and consulting.
card1_desc: Real-time payment dashboard with WebGL charts, auditing, and workspace-based permissions.
cv_job1_desc: Developed user interfaces for modern web applications, focusing on reusable components and performance optimization.
cv_job1_achievements: Developed 15+ reusable React components, reducing development time by 40%
Implemented lazy loading and code splitting, improving initial load time by 60%
Collaborated on the design of a design token system that unified the visual experience
Mentored 2 junior developers in frontend best practices
cv_job1_a1: Improved user experience with “liquid glass” menus and microinteractions.
cv_job2_desc: Led frontend development for complex SaaS products, specializing in UX and working closely with design teams.
cv_job2_achievements: Architected and developed the frontend of a SaaS platform with 50k+ active users
Implemented an A/B testing system that increased conversions by 25%
Designed and developed a complete design system with Storybook and documentation
Collaborated with UX designers in research and usability testing
Optimized web accessibility, achieving WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
cv_job3_desc: Lead frontend development teams while specializing in UX, combining technical skills with user insights to create exceptional products.
cv_job3_achievements: Lead a team of 5 frontend developers on high-impact projects
Conduct user research and usability testing sessions
Designed micro-frontend architecture that scaled to 100k+ users
Implemented UX metrics that improved user satisfaction by 35%
Created internal workshops on UX/UI for development teams
Developed interactive prototypes in Figma and Framer for rapid validation
